### WriteDXILToFile() {#a0096360a382602b21e0e980fb8069d52}

<MemberDefinition

Write the specified module to the specified raw output stream.

Write the specified module to the specified output stream.

For streams where it matters, the given stream should be in &quot;binary&quot; mode.
